showroom.address: Forest Heights Property Gallery 23 & 24-G, Jalan Forest Heights 8, Taman Tan Chee Hoe, 70450 Seremban, Negeri Sembilan

description: Where others are merely concerned with style and function, Broadhill considers the holistic aspects of elevated living up to 324 ft above sea level. Built to be a richly vital neighborhood, it features comforting elegance and award-winning landscape design with 2.78 acres of Hill Park. It features double storey premier-link homes and three storey super-link homes with up to 3,306 sqft of spacious built-up area.
features: Elevated Living, 324 Ft. Above Sea Level
Award-winning Landscape Design With 2.78 Acres Of Hill Park
